$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") ## hide if no forum #set ($forum = $core_v2_forum.Current) #if (!$forum) #set($forums = $core_v2_forum.List("%{ GroupId = $core_v2_group.Current.Id, PageSize = 2, PageIndex = 0 }")) #if ($forums && $forums.TotalCount == 1) #foreach($f in $forums) #set($forum = $f) #end #else $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #end ## hide if forum does not support QA #set ($supportsQuestionThreads = false) #foreach ($threadType in $forum.AllowedThreadTypes) #if ($threadType == 'QuestionAndAnswer') #set($supportsQuestionThreads = true) #end #end #if (!$supportsQuestionThreads) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end ## hide if accessing user cannot create threads #if(!$core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_forumPermissions.CreatePost, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $forum.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_forum.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set ($questionInputId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('questionInput')) #set ($submitId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('submitInput'))
